Hero.subheading: Because great relationships start with thoughtful recognition.

about_us.caption: ABOUT US
about_us.heading: Putting People First
about_us.body: At Perkflow, we believe that recognition goes beyond words, it's about creating unforgettable moments that inspire and motivate. Our mission is to transform the way companies reward their teams by offering seamless, impactful travel experiences that celebrate achievements and foster a culture of appreciation.

card1.title: People-Centric Rewards
card1.content: We understand that at the heart of every successful company are its people. That's why we focus on delivering personalized travel rewards that resonate with your team's aspirations, ensuring they feel valued and motivated.

card2.title: Seamless Execution
card2.content: From planning to execution, we handle every detail of your incentive travel programs. Our streamlined processes ensure a hassle-free experience, allowing you to focus on what matters most—your business and your people.

card3.title: Strategic Impact
card3.content: Our programs are designed not just to reward but to drive performance. By aligning travel incentives with your company's goals, we help boost productivity, enhance employee engagement, and improve retention rates.

values.caption: Values
values.heading: Our Values
values.subheading: What we stand for and how we show up.

card1.title: Build with purpose
card1.content: We don’t build for buzz, we solve real problems that impact how people feel and perform at work.

card2.title: Celebrate the journey
card2.content: We value the steps it takes to succeed. Growth, learning, and effort are worth recognizing.

card3.title: Lead with empathy
card3.content: We lead by listening. We assume good intentions,  and balance kindness with accountability.

card4.title: Practice what we preach
card4.content: We use Perkflow to celebrate each other because we believe in our product, and we live our mission.

card5.title: Grow through ownership
card5.content: We take initiative, own our outcomes, and support one another with accountability.

card6.title: Continuous improvment
card6.content: We ask questions. We challenge what’s outdated. And we keep evolving—together.

our_team.caption: Our team
our_team.heading: Leadership team
our_team.subheading: Our diverse team brings together extensive experience in HR, tech, and product design, ignited by a vision to create workspaces where employees can truly thrive.

leading_companies.text: We are backed by programs from leading companies in Ai, Infra, Compliance & Cloud
